content:
The 28th HL7 FHIR Connectathon will take place September 13-15, 2021. In advance of the Connectathon, the CARIN IG for Blue ButtonÂ® track will hold an information session, which is scheduled for Thursday, September 9 at 12:30 pm ET. We will provide an overview of the track and will answer any questions that might be helpful as you prepare for the Connectathon.

The zoom information for the information session is: Join from PC, Mac, Linux, iOS or Android: https://leavittpartners.zoom.us/j/95385150881?pwd=bitlWW13aXpCWVRLbWljSUF2d0h6Zz09 Password: 346362

The track page can be found here: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=118981661

We look forward to speaking with you all tomorrow.
